about_the_game:
You've graduated Spacefleet Academy and are moving up in the world! You get access to DLC-Exclusive content, online bonuses, and gain access to tons of new operators!

Join the fight for Spacefleet!

Evil pours through the land like a plague threatening the peace and stability of the United Alliance of Planets! Get access to new operators to deploy and take out this alien threat!

Immediately gain access to
  • A Permanent 10% Experience Boost
  • Unlock All In-Game Standard Operators
  • Unlock All DLC-Exclusive Skins

Ask not for an easier life, ask to be stronger to take on life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Gain access to DLC-Exclusive content such as a new operator, multiplayer buffs, skins, and other gameplay enhancing features
